title: OATMEAL IN A MUG
directions: Mix it all up into a coffee mug!
Put it in the microwave for 1 minute, make sure it doesnâ€™t overflow! Add an extra 30 sec if it needs to firm up.

tbsp soy milk or regular milk (for added moistness!)
